RoyalTitleDef.label: commfriend
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has shown a willingness to work with the Commerce Branch.

RoyalTitleDef.label: exchanger
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the trust of the Commerce Branch, and as such has limited access to its economic tools.

RoyalTitleDef.label: trader
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the trust of the Commerce Branch, and may prevail upon it for occasional lesser favors.

RoyalTitleDef.label: investor
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the trust of the Commerce Branch, and may prevail upon it for occasional favors, such as making investments or bribes.

RoyalTitleDef.label: financier
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the esteem of the Commerce Branch, and may prevail upon it for occasional favors, such as making investments, offering bribes, or obtaining resources.

RoyalTitleDef.label: marketeer
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the esteem of the Commerce Branch, and may prevail upon it for favors, such as making investments, influencing third parties, or obtaining resources.

RoyalTitleDef.label: bankroller
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the esteem of the Commerce Branch, and may prevail upon it for all manner of economic favors.

RoyalTitleDef.label: paxfriend
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has shown a willingness to work with the Pax Branch.

RoyalTitleDef.label: buckler
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the trust of the Pax Branch, and may prevail upon it for the occasional lesser favor, such as deploying automated defense turrets or soliciting mortar shells.

RoyalTitleDef.label: adarga
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the trust of the Pax Branch, and may prevail upon it for occasional lesser favors, such as deploying automated defense turrets or soliciting combat resources.

RoyalTitleDef.label: aspis
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the trust of the Pax Branch, and may prevail upon it for various occasional lesser favors, such as deploying automated defense turrets or soliciting combat resources.

RoyalTitleDef.label: ishilangu
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the esteem of the Pax Branch, and may prevail upon it for various occasional favors, such as deploying automated defense turrets, deploying shields, or soliciting combat resources.

RoyalTitleDef.label: pavise
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the esteem of the Pax Branch, and may prevail upon it for various favors, such as deploying automated defenses, soliciting dangerously potent combat resources, or requisitioning the use of climate-affecting weapons.

RoyalTitleDef.label: fortress
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the esteem of the Pax Branch, and may prevail upon it for a vast breadth of favors pertaining to the conduct of warfare.

RoyalTitleDef.label: roverfriend
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has shown a willingness to work with the Rover Branch.

RoyalTitleDef.label: roamling
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the trust of the Rover Branch, and may prevail upon it for the occasional lesser favor.

RoyalTitleDef.label: itinerant
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the trust of the Rover Branch, and may prevail upon it for occasional lesser favors.

RoyalTitleDef.label: wayfarer
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the trust of the Rover Branch, and may prevail upon it for occasional favors.

RoyalTitleDef.label: voyager
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the esteem of the Rover Branch, and may prevail upon it for occasional favors, such as locating sites of interest or calling transportation.

RoyalTitleDef.label: cartographer
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the esteem of the Rover Branch, and may prevail upon it for favors, such as locating sites of interest or calling transportation.

RoyalTitleDef.label: globetrotter
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the esteem of the Rover Branch, and may prevail upon it all manner of travel- and navigation-related favors.

RoyalTitleDef.label: archivefriend
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has shown a willingness to work with the Archive Branch.

RoyalTitleDef.label: lector
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the trust of the Archive Branch, and may prevail upon it for the occasional lesser favor, such as obtaining dossiers of information or improving items.

RoyalTitleDef.label: archivist
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the trust of the Archive Branch, and may prevail upon it for occasional lesser favors, such as obtaining dossiers of information, improving items, or scanning the terrain.

RoyalTitleDef.label: docent
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the trust of the Archive Branch, and may prevail upon it for occasional lesser favors, such as obtaining unique kinds of ideoligious knowledge, improving items, or scanning the terrain.

RoyalTitleDef.label: lorekeeper
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the esteem of the Archive Branch, and may prevail upon it for occasional favors, such as obtaining valuable forms of information, improving and restoring items, or scanning the terrain.

RoyalTitleDef.label: antiquarian
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the esteem of the Archive Branch, and may prevail upon it for favors, such as obtaining valuable forms of information, improving and restoring items, or scanning the terrain.

RoyalTitleDef.label: curator
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the esteem of the Archive Branch, and may prevail upon it for all manner of favors pertaining to information, relics, and item enhancement.

RoyalTitleDef.label: ecofriend
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has shown a willingness to work with the Ecosphere Branch.

RoyalTitleDef.label: tender
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the trust of the Ecosphere Branch, and may prevail upon it for the occasional lesser favor, such as the delivery of small animals or cheap medical equipment.

RoyalTitleDef.label: gardener
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the trust of the Ecosphere Branch, and may prevail upon it for occasional lesser favors, such as the delivery of animals or direct medical aid.

RoyalTitleDef.label: naturalist
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the trust of the Ecosphere Branch, and may prevail upon it for occasional favors, such as the delivery of animals, medical technology, or direct medical aid.

RoyalTitleDef.label: edenite
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the esteem of the Ecosphere Branch, and may prevail upon it for occasional favors, such as the delivery of animals, medical aid, genetic manipulation, terraforming, or climate adjustment.

RoyalTitleDef.label: gaean
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the esteem of the Ecosphere Branch, and may prevail upon it for favors, such as the delivery of animals, medical aid, genetic manipulation, terraforming, or climate adjustment.

RoyalTitleDef.label: worldshaper
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the esteem of the Ecosphere Branch, and may prevail upon it for all manner of favors pertaining to medicine, health, flora, fauna, and the environment.

RoyalTitleDef.label: occultfriend
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has shown a willingness to work with the Occult Branch.

RoyalTitleDef.label: dabbler
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the trust of the Occult Branch, and may prevail upon it for the occasional lesser favor.

RoyalTitleDef.label: tamperer
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the trust of the Occult Branch, and may prevail upon it for the occasional favor.

RoyalTitleDef.label: practitioner
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the trust of the Occult Branch, and may prevail upon it for occasional favors, ranging from suffusing individuals with psychic energy to deploying archotechnologically-mutated combatants.

RoyalTitleDef.label: convoker
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the esteem of the Occult Branch, and may prevail upon it for a breadth of favors.

RoyalTitleDef.label: thaumaturge
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the esteem of the Occult Branch, and may prevail upon it a breadth of esoteric favors.

RoyalTitleDef.label: revelantor
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the esteem of the Occult Branch, and may prevail upon it for all manner of favors pertaining to psychic phenomena and related technology.
